text: Sophie Dessus (24 September 1955 - 3 March 2016) was a French Socialist politician. She was born in Suresnes, France. She represented Corrèze's First Constituency in the National Assembly, the first woman to represent Corrèze in the National Assembly. She served from 20 June 2012 until her death in 3 March 2016. Dessus died in Limoges, France of cancer on 3 March 2016. She was aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== *Dessus's official website Category:1955 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from Hauts-de-Seine Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:People from Corrèze Category:Suresnes
title: Sophie Dessus
